articles.title: Harry and Meghan, Going Their Own Way
articles.description: One reader cheers, “Good for them.” Another calls them “hyperprivileged.” Some are dismayed by the extensive media coverage.
articles.content:
They are hyperprivileged, very wealthy people who contribute nothing but celebrity to society Kardashians with titles. Why their doings should be considered of concern to the educated, informed readers of your newspaper baffles me completely.

articles.author: Matt Richtel
articles.title: Alcohol Deaths Have Risen Sharply, Particularly Among Women
articles.description: An analysis of death certificates over nearly two decades contained several troubling findings.
articles.content:
The number of women drinking dangerous amounts of alcohol is rising sharply in the United States.
That finding was among several troubling conclusions in an analysis of death certificates published Friday by the National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoho… [+958 chars]

articles.title: Four Winter Romance Novels Find Love in Hopeless Places
